sentences.en: Approximately 10.5 cm down from the nape. Use the armhole seams as a guide Measure generously.
sentences.cn: 颈背以下约10.5cm处,以袖窿缝为界,量得稍松点.

sentences.en: Begin in the center nape triangle.
sentences.cn: 在中心项三角形中开始.

sentences.en: Crest —— the nape of the neck.
sentences.cn: 脖冠.位于头盖骨后方脖子隆起的部位.

sentences.en: He kissed her on the nape of her neck.
Her hair was cut short at the nape of her neck.
sentences.cn: 她脖子后面的头发剪得很短。

sentences.en: Her long fair hair was fastened at the nape of her neck by an elastic band.
sentences.cn: 她用皮筋将金色长发扎在脑后。

sentences.en: Improvement of nape pain and neurologic status did not differ with and without using PS fixation.
sentences.cn: 颈痛的改善和神经学状况的变化情况在两组中均无显著差异.

sentences.en: It makes the hairs at the nape of the neck bristle.
Long, muscular, clean - cut , without dewlap, slightly arched in the nape, flowing gracefully into the shoulders.
sentences.cn: 长, 肌肉发达, 整洁, 无赘肉, 颈背略微圆拱, 流畅地融入肩部.

sentences.en: Nape needle can obviously ameliorate blood supply of vertebra basilar artery.
sentences.cn: 项针能明显改善椎-基底动脉的血液供应.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the clinical efficacy of nape massage in the treatment of juvenile true myopia.
sentences.cn: 摘要目的探讨以项背部推拿为主综合治疗对青少年真性近视的疗效.

sentences.en: Purpose To observe the effect of nape acupuncture on essential Hypertension.
sentences.cn: 目的观察项针疗法对高血压病的影响.

sentences.en: She cut the hair close to the nape of the neck.
sentences.cn: 她把头发剪到接近颈部.

sentences.en: The head is whitish with some fine streaking restricted to nape.
sentences.cn: 头部全白,仅有一些局限于后颈的纤细纵纹.

sentences.en: the soft warm nape of her neck
Theof his leather stock was under his left ear instead of the nape of his neck.
sentences.cn: 他皮领的钮扣不在他颈后,而在他左耳上边.

trans.tran_en: the bottom part of the back of your neck, where the hair ends
